Assist with bed rest.sentence: The nurse evaluates the patient's condition and mobility limitations to determine the appropriate level of bed rest required.
Assist with bed rest.subject: The nurse
Assist with bed rest.object: the patient's condition and mobility limitations

Assist with bed rest.sentence: The nurse explains the importance of bed rest to the patient to ensure understanding and compliance with the procedure.
Assist with bed rest.subject: The nurse

Assist with bed rest.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably in bed, ensuring proper alignment to prevent pressure sores and discomfort.
Assist with bed rest.subject: The nurse

Assist with bed rest.sentence: The nurse monitors the patient's vital signs regularly to identify any changes in health status during bed rest.
Assist with bed rest.subject: The nurse

Assist with bed rest.sentence: The nurse provides assistance with activities of daily living as needed, ensuring the patient remains safe and comfortable while on bed rest.
Assist with bed rest.subject: The nurse
Assist with bed rest.object: assistance with activities of daily living
